name: Cherriage
description:
Your Mission

Chanti: "We're trapped. Let's move Merlo, we have to get to the window, before they come back and eat us!"

Merlo: "Tranquille, look in which mess they left the table. The big guy with the monobrow even glued the card pyramides together. Seems like they should stay together quite well."

Chanti: "Merlo! We have to hurry up, Who would leave behind a cake like this one?"

Merlo: "You're part of the cake now. I'd say that makes it looka a lot more delicious."

Chanti: "Okay, Merlo, last try: WE. HAVE. TO. GET. TO. THE. WINDOW! I would do it on my own, but ... rgh, I hate that cherry siblings have to be connected. Man, what I could do without that!"

Merlo: "Okay okay, calm down, I got it. Let's move."

Chanti: "I think you mean: Let's find a way to move. It doesn't look as if there is a straight way to the window."

The Creators

Textures & VisualDevelopment by Marlene Lynn Beumker

3D Models by Lena Pauly

Programming and LevelDesign by Conrad Schweiker
